title: Print, "Waterfall of Maples (Momiji no Taki), No. 34", ca. 1910
markings: In graphite, lower left: Waterfall of Maples
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: [Japanese characters] / no. 34 / Momiji no Taki.
description: A large iris, outer perianth leaves violet; inner leaves white with deep magenta tips.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Waterfall of Maples (Momiji no Taki), No. 34", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. 40.8 x 27.9 cm (16 1/16 in. x 11 in.). Gift of Mary Rutherford Jay. 1948-134-87.
